evidence.claim: Medarcus is HIPAA compliant, which indicates its commitment to handling health information securely.
The technology used supports data integration within health tech standards, indicating potential use of FHIR.
Medarcus offers integration capabilities with EHR systems, which typically require compliance with health standards like HL7.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 or API automation use cases on their site.
